data.message: Emi, I asked you to do a ride a long for a week with a patrol officer...you should do one in Detroit and then you'll see the criminals at work.  Maybe then you can have respect for everybody.  My police officer brother deserves that respect.  He's out there protecting you and you show him ungrateful ness....please apologize. I never was a fan of you...the lyrics in your music are disturbing along with your profile picture.  Seek help with God!

replies.message: Eminem already has all your money he wants.

He may have all the money Arikan but he doesn't want to lose it cuz if he does while Mr.  Trump being around doing what's best for the middle class, Emi will have to resort to Ramen Noodles...and by looking at his profile, he doesn't have God in his life...:)
